core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: ERP structure + Fintech polish
Emotion First: The user should feel 'In Control' and 'Progressing'
Content is King: Every step explains 'Why'
Negative Space: High density data needs room to breathe
design_philosophy.visual_style: Clean, structured, vertical-timeline driven, with subtle glassmorphic accents.

usage_rules: Use Primary (Deep Indigo) for main actions and active states.
Use Accent (Electric Indigo/Violet) for focus rings and active step indicators.
Backgrounds should never be pure white (#ffffff) for the main page canvas; use #f1f5f9 (Slate-100).
Sidebar and Cards should be pure white to pop against the grey background.

StepTimeline.description: Vertical list of steps with connecting lines.

visuals.line: w-0.5 bg-slate-200 absolute left-4 top-10 bottom-0
visuals.node_active: w-8 h-8 rounded-full bg-primary text-white flex items-center justify-center shadow-lg shadow-indigo-500/30 ring-4 ring-indigo-50 z-10 relative
visuals.node_completed: w-8 h-8 rounded-full bg-green-500 text-white flex items-center justify-center z-10 relative
visuals.node_pending: w-8 h-8 rounded-full bg-white border-2 border-slate-200 text-slate-400 flex items-center justify-center z-10 relative

WorkspacePanel.description: The active area where the user works.
WorkspacePanel.container: bg-white rounded-xl shadow-sm border border-slate-200 overflow-hidden
WorkspacePanel.header: px-8 py-6 border-b border-slate-100 bg-white sticky top-0 z-10
WorkspacePanel.footer: px-8 py-4 bg-slate-50 border-t border-slate-100 flex justify-between items-center

ProgressBar.location: Top of Sidebar or Top of Main Content

interactive_states.hover: All clickable cards/items must have `hover:bg-slate-50` and `transition-colors duration-200`.
interactive_states.focus: All inputs must have `focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500/20 focus:border-indigo-500`.
interactive_states.step_transition: Use Framer Motion `AnimatePresence` for smooth cross-fading between step content.

assets.logo_placeholder: Use a text placeholder 'NETRA' with font-bold if no logo image is available.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers/footers.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
instructions_to_main_agent: Create a main layout file (e.g., `SalesFunnelLayout.jsx`) that manages the state of the wizard. Use a 'currentStep' state to render the appropriate sub-component in the right panel. Mock the sub-components (PricingBuilder, SOWBuilder) with simple placeholder cards if they don't exist, but ensure the routing/logic is ready to connect. Ensure the Sidebar is responsive (collapses to a top bar on mobile).
